trans-unit.source: Read the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property in an event handler to determine whether the sign-out was initiated by the IP (a sign-out clean-up request message was received by the RP), or whether the sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"></xref> class by using a value that specifies whether sign-out was requested by the identity provider (IP).
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property is set to the value of the `isIPInitiated` parameter.
`true` if sign-out was requested by the IP; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"></xref> that indicates sign-out was initiated by the identity provider (IP).
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"></xref> that has its <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated"></xref> property set `true`.
Gets a value that indicates whether sign-out was initiated by the identity provider (IP) via a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up message ("wsignoutcleanup1.0").

In an event handler, you can use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property to determine whether the sign-out was initiated by the IP (a sign-out clean-up request message was received by the RP), or whether the sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).
`true` if sign-out was initiated by the IP; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"></xref> that indicates sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs"></xref> that has its <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated"></xref> property set `false`.
